numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that in most sports more than 50% of the players are players of color.
2. Major League Baseball is an exception.
3. In Major League Baseball, not more than 50% of the players are players of color.
4. I notice that in all professional sports teams less than 50% of the head coaches are head coaches of color.
5. I wonder why there is a significant difference between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of head coaches of color.
7. This difference impacts which players in my community want to play professionally later in life.
8. These bar graphs show the diversity of each sport.
9. These bar graphs compare the players and the head coaches in each sport.
10. A possible name is "Diversity On the Court and Field".
